00039 #ifndef ORO_CORBA_SUPPORT_HH
00040 #define ORO_CORBA_SUPPORT_HH
00041 
00042 #include "rtt-corba-config.h"
00043 
00044 // This macro had to be introduced to make Omniorb compatible with Xenomai.
00045 // Omniorb4 creates its own threads, which are not Xenomai threads.
00046 // This check turns plain posix threads into Xenomai threads on the Xenomai target.
00047 #define CORBA_CHECK_THREAD()
00048 
00049 #if CORBA_IS_TAO
00050 # include <ace/SString.h>
00051 # include <tao/corba.h>
00052 # include <tao/PortableServer/PS_ForwardC.h>
00053 # define CORBA_SERVANT(f) f ## "S.h"
00054 # define CORBA_EXCEPTION_INFO(x) x._info().c_str()
00055 # ifndef ACE_THROW_SPEC
00056 #  define ACE_THROW_SPEC(X) throw X
00057 # endif
00058 #else
00059 # include <omniORB4/CORBA.h>
00060 # include <omniORB4/poa.h>
00061 namespace CORBA {
00062     typedef Any* Any_ptr;
00063 }
00064 # undef ACE_THROW_SPEC
00065 # define ACE_THROW_SPEC(x)
00066 # undef ACE_THROW
00067 # define ACE_THROW(x)
00068 # define CORBA_EXCEPTION_INFO(x) x._name()
00069 // This Xenomai specific work-around is required for omniorb.
00070 # ifdef OROCOS_TARGET_XENOMAI
00071 #  undef CORBA_CHECK_THREAD
00072 #  define CORBA_CHECK_THREAD() if (rt_task_self() == 0) rt_task_shadow(0,0,0,0)
00073 # endif
00074 #endif
00075 
00076 #endif
